sizes_available: Before felting: 16" wide x 15" tall x 5" deep; After felting: 13½" wide x 10" tall x 3½" deep
full_text: Description from the pattern: " A felted carpet bag with floral embellishments…..For intermediate to advanced knitters. " No gauge is specified in the pattern. The Deco-Ribbon yarn weight is: Bulky Needle Type: Bag - US 13 / 9.0 mm, 35 or 40" circular needle; 2 x US 13 / 9.0 mm, double pointed needles for I-cord. Floral Embellishments - US 7 / 4.5 mm, 35" or longer circular needle; US 7 / 4.5 mm double pointed needles. Additional Materials: 4 stitch markers, one of which should be uniquely colored to mark the beginning of rounds. 1 pair of Crystal Palace Handbag Handles #HD57 - Bamboo effect Tapestry needle Sewing needle Coordinating sewing thread This pattern is no longer listed on the Crystal Palace Yarns website. I will be moving it to my own site in the near future. Until then, you may access it through the archived CPY Site at Wayback.org. Please see the pattern index at this link to access the pattern: http://web.archive.org/web/20091231094416/http://straw.co...
name: Ravelry: English Garden Felted Carpetbag pattern by Terry L. Ross
